â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ At the dawn of the 22nd century, the conquest of space and the          â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ colonization of the solar system is being monopolized by several huge   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ and ambitious mega-corporations. Although extremely delicate and        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ vulnerable, a balance is maintained by these companies. At the very     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ edge of the solar system the companies make a discovery which will      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ shift the technological advantage and upset the balance. And so a new   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ conflict is born: "The Jupiter Incident".                               â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Nexus - The Jupiter Incident is a real-time mission-based tactical      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ space game featuring spectacular real time battles and breathtaking     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ motion picture quality. Focus on tactics and action as you control up   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ to a dozen battleships encountering aliens, unknown solar systems and   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ astrophysical phenomena in your struggle to save Earth.                 â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Are you ready to take on the challenge?                                 â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
